item.title: US launches phase two of Gaza peace plan with new technocratic government
item.description: It includes the establishment of a technocratic Palestinian government, as well as the reconstruction and demilitarisation of Gaza, US envoy Steve Wit...

item.title: Why two Canadian provinces are in a spat over Crown Royal whisky
item.description: The UK-owned, Canadian-made whisky is testing a united "Team Canada" approach in the face of US tariffs.

item.title: 'Appropriate and unambiguous': White House defends Trump over middle-finger gesture at heckler
item.description: Thousands of people have sent donations totalling nearly $700,000 (Â£521,000) to the heckler, who was suspended from his job at Ford.

item.title: Trump administration pauses immigrant visa processing for 75 countries
item.description: The pause starting on 21 January will bar foreign nationals who 'would take welfare and public benefits.'

item.title: Uganda election chief says he has had threats over results declaration
item.description: This follows comments by a presidential assistant that Bobi Wine would not be declared president, even if he wins.
